name: The Untold Story of the Origin of MIFEARS

metadata.name: Epigraph
metadata.description:
My true story of my never-before-told fall to the very bottom, or a terrible time for me, has brought me invaluable experience.

I finally found the strength to tell my story, to tell it to you, hoping that someone would find in this story a reference to themselves, think about important things, find the motivation to stand up against themselves, against their fears!

MIFEARS is a collective image of my fears, experiences and events I have experienced over the past year. The images are abstract without a clear structure or form. I want each viewer to be able to see something special in them that resonates in their heart.

What was it? Who is to blame? And who is right?  
You can find the answers in a short story I call "The Untold Story of the Origin of MIFEARS.

I'll open my heart to you without asking for anything in return!
